thread.title: Market Sales Manager - Atlanta - Sports Media
thread.title_full: Market Sales Manager - Atlanta - Sports Media

title: Market Sales Manager - Atlanta - Sports Media
text: Posted/Updated: 10-07-2015 Brief Job Description: Effectively presenting our services to potential and existing clients. Providing and excellent level of service to meet course needs. Engaging prospect courses for future distribution partnerships   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
